channel.title: Setting Server to Require my Client
channel.description:
I am pretty sure this is both Server/Client sided so, not sure which section this goes into.
I have tried a few TUTs on this, but none of them have seemed to work. If someone could please help me, that would be fantastic. I have already, like I said, tried to figure this out, but haven't managed. Oh, and yes, I did use the Search Tab and Google.

item.title: Setting Server to Require my Client
item.dc:creator: @binladin305 binladin305
item.description:
@binladin305 wrote:

open up server.ini file (the file with the gear on it) if where it says:
ClientRequired=0

replace the “0” with a “1”

Read full topic
item.source: Setting Server to Require my Client
